attributes.action: say NO to Boris Johnson as future leader of Tory Party
attributes.additional_details: I also question BJ's motive and not convinced that it was due to his deeply held idealogical convictions but rather his political ambition to occupy No 10.
attributes.background: Brexit was won 51.9% for Leave vs 48.1% Remain. The country is very divided. The Brexit agenda would  have won were it not for Boris Johnson adding an acceptable and charamastic "face" to the campaign.
